meanings.definition: The act of submitting something for consideration or approval.
meanings.sent1: The submittals of our project proposal were carefully prepared.
meanings.sent2: Please ensure all submittals are complete before sending them for review.
meanings.sent3: The submittals for the bake-off contest were so delicious that the judges couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: Her submittals of creative ideas were like a breath of fresh air in the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The submittals of the winning entries will be displayed at the exhibition.

meanings.definition: Documents or materials submitted for review or approval.
meanings.sent1: The architect provided detailed submittals of the building plans.
meanings.sent2: All submittals must be signed by the project manager.
meanings.sent3: The submittals for the art show were so colorful and vibrant.
meanings.sent4: His submittals of research findings were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The submittals of the budget report were neatly organized and easy to understand.
